sect2.title: Introduction to Emacs
sect2.para: The Emacs package contains the extensible, customizable, self-documenting real-time display editor.

sect2.title: Installation of Emacs
sect2.para: Install Emacs by running the following commands:

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Emacs package contains emacs, b2m, ctags, ebrowse, emacsclient, etags, grep-changelog, rcs-checkin, cvt-mail, digest-doc, emacsserver, fakemail, hexl, movemail, profile, rcs2log, sorted-doc, vcdiff and yow.

sect3.title: b2m
sect3.para: b2m is a program to convert mail files from RMAIL format to Unix mbox format.

sect3.title: ctags
sect3.para: ctags creates cross-reference tagfile database files for source code.

sect3.title: ebrowse
sect3.para: ebrowse permits browsing of C++ class hierarchies from within emacs.

sect3.title: emacsclient
sect3.para: emacsclient attaches an emacs session to an already running emacsserver instance.

sect3.title: etags
sect3.para: etags is another program to generate source code cross-reference tagfiles.

sect3.title: grep-changelog
sect3.para: grep-changelog prints entries in Change Logs matching various criteria.

sect3.title: rcs-checkin
sect3.para: rcs-checkin is a shell script used to check files into RCS.

sect3.title: cvt-mail
sect3.para: cvt-mail converts old style goslings emacs mail directories into gnu-rmail format.

sect3.title: digest-doc
sect3.para: digest-doc is a filter to create nroff output for man pages.

sect3.title: emacsserver
sect3.para: emacserver allows other applications/shells to access an already running emacs instance and share buffers with it.

sect3.title: fakemail
sect3.para: fakemail is a sendmail-like interface to /bin/mail.

sect3.title: hexl
sect3.para: hexl converts files for editing with emacs hexl-mode binary file editing mode.

sect3.title: movemail
sect3.para: movemail provides access to POP3 mailboxes.

sect3.title: profile
sect3.para: profile generates periodic events for profiling of Emacs Lisp code.

sect3.title: rcs2log
sect3.para: rcs2log generates change log prefixes from RCS files.

sect3.title: sorted-doc
sect3.para: sorted-doc is a filter to generate texinfo files.

sect3.title: yow
sect3.para: yow prints a quotation from Zippy the Pinhead.
